nytimes.title: Same-Sex Marriages Proceed in Parts of Alabama, Amid Judicial Chaos
nytimes.topComment: Don't talk about "backwards Alabama". Sure, Justice Moore is a judge there, a position he got due to his ultraconservative politics. I prefer to think of Judge Graffeo who teared up officiating the first same sex wedding. And Judge King, who said "If...

nytimes.title: DealBook: Consumer Protection Agency Seeks Limits on Payday Lenders
nytimes.topComment:
The wealthy among us are investing their surplus income in credit products that take advantage of the financially desperate. They do this to obtain higher growth rates for their capital.
